description: Never-ending trails, fireside sessions, and bike rides in mountain-to-town style—the Super Aros Fleece Hoody can do it all. This vintage-inspired high-pile fleece hoodie is a looker with a relaxed retro swagger that will make you feel warm and cozy just looking at it. You can thank old school color blocking and super lofty, pillowy-soft sherpa fleece for that. Sunrise hikes to late night shenanigans, there's nothing the Super Aros won't fit with and nowhere it won't comfortably fit in when there's a chill in the air or chilling on the agenda.
name: Marmot Super Aros Fleece Hoodie - Mens
